title: How to Do Niche Research for Amazon Kdp - NO paid tool required
description:
The Biggest Challenges amazon kdp publisher face is keyword and niche research.

so In this video, I explained how to figure out a niche and know the kind of books in that Niche and how to to craft your next book idea easily.
